pullrequest.title: Add RCPServer and RPCCLient base clients for more organised communication between labscript programs

content.raw:
Oh, I did not think about this at all. I guess I subconsciously thought of the programs as being in a long-lived connection to each other and assumed they would check at the start that versions were as required. But of course BLACS can come and go and might not be the same versions of things each time, so a single check won't do at all - will probably have to be integrated into the requests as you said.

Will sleep on it and see if any other possibilities present themselves.
